description: You reinforce your shelter with debris, branches, and whatever materials you can gather nearby.

success.resultNarration: You strengthen the shelter without drawing any unwanted attention.

failure.resultNarration: Loose debris shifts underfoot, twisting your ankle.

choices.text: Drag heavier debris to block the entrance

success.resultNarration: You drag debris into place, solidifying your defensive position.

failure.resultNarration: The debris crashes loudly — you worry it may attract unwanted attention.

choices.text: Set up a basic noise alarm with cans and wire

success.resultNarration: The tripwire alarm is set. It won’t stop anything, but it helps you rest easier.

failure.resultNarration: The wire snaps as you tighten it. You'll need to rethink the setup.
